description:
A version of this Love Me review was initially posted after its premiere at the 2024 Sundance Film Festival. It has been updated for the movie’s theatrical release.

Logline

Centuries after an extinction event wipes out humanity, two surviving AIs — an internet-enabled robotic buoy and an orbiting satellite (played by Kristen Stewart and Steven Yeun, respectively) — forge a tentative emotional connection and start emulating their long-gone creators. Proble
title: WALL-E grows up in  the wildly ambitious sci-fi romance Love Me

description:
The Fishing Rod is an equipable item in Hello Kitty Island Adventure. As its name suggests, you can use it to catch fish and other sea critters to add to your inventory in the game. Although the general structure of Hello Kitty Island Adventure is pretty open, the Fishing Rod is one of a handful of items you’ll need if you want to progress the game.

Fish can be traded with certain characters to help improve your Friendship Level and unlock additional content in the game. You can also use fish while cooking with recipes, or donate them to the Nature Preserve in Spo
title: How to unlock the Fishing Rod in Hello Kitty Island Adventure

description:
The Net is an equippable item in Hello Kitty Island Adventure that allows you to catch bugs and other critters around the island. If you want to become the bug-catcher extraordinaire of your dreams, you’ll want to focus on getting one as soon as possible in the game.

The net’s function is straightforward: It allows you to catch bugs (and other critters) and store them in your inventory. Like any other resource in the game, there are different ways to use these critters. You can gift creatures and use them to level up yo
title: How to unlock the Net in Hello Kitty Island Adventure

description:
You can time travel in Hello Kitty Island Adventure, and while it’s one way to supercharge your playthrough, doing so comes with risks — to the degree you might not want to avoid time traveling altogether.

Much of the game progression in Hello Kitty Island Adventure is tied to the Frienship Level you reach with characters. The better friends you become with all the Sanrio cuties, the more quests and items you can unlock. You can level up your friendship with characters by giving them gifts, but the game limits the number of items you can give
title: How to time travel in Hello Kitty Island Adventure, and why it’s risky

description: Not only did Rebecca Sugar create Steven Universe, one of the most iconic and groundbreaking cartoons of the modern era, she also wrote a ton of music for the show and the
title: Rebecca Sugar’s Spiral Bound and Steven Universe movie vinyls are now up for pre-order

description:
Netflix dropped a new look at its upcoming animated series based on Devil May Cry on Thursday, revealing the opening credits for Adi Shankar and Studio Mir’s anime adaptation of the Capcom franchise. In a surprise, bold, and incredibly fitting choice, the Devil May Cry anime will open with Limp Bizkit’s “Rollin’,” the breakout single from the nu metal band’s 2000 album Chocolate Starfish and the Hot Dog Flavored Water.

The original Devil May Cry and Limp Bizkit’s third album were both products of the early 2000s —
title: Netflix’s Devil May Cry makes a bold choice with a Limp Bizkit-powered opening

description: There are guns without much recoil, and then there’s the Cypher 091 in Black Ops 6. This is the latest weapon to be added to the FPS game at the start of the second season — and if you’re not using it yet, you should be. It is a strong contender to be one of the best assault rifles in the game, but don’t just take our word for it: Let us run you through the best Cypher 091 loadout so you can try it for yourself.
title: Best Cypher 091 loadout, class build in Black Ops 6

description:
Veteran Call of Duty players will rejoice about the return of a powerful SMG: The best PPSh-41 loadout in Black Ops 6 will feel right at home, as if you’re playing World at War or WWII again. The gun hasn’t changed one bit, which means it’s still an incredibly fast-firing SMG with a lot of recoil that decimates enemies up close.

So when using it in Black Ops 6, you want to take advantage of
title: Best PPSh-41 loadout, class build in Black Ops 6

description:
A newly-discovered bug in Diablo 4 is causing some players to deal so much damage that the numbers don’t even matter anymore.

Although the specifics of how the bug works are still unclear, it’s skyrocketing the power of classes that weren’t even close to clearing the game’s hardest dungeon type just a day ago. One player has claimed the top spot on the unofficial leaderboards with a two-minute clear on the Spiritborn, a class that
title: Diablo 4 players reach infinite damage through a new game-breaking bug

description:
Pokémon Tool cards are a kind of trainer card added in Pokémon TCG Pocket as part of the Space-Time Smackdown update.

As of time of writing, there are three Tool cards in total: Giant Cape, Rocky Helmet, and Lum Berry. They aren’t super rare, powerful Pokémon, but you’ll definitely want to learn how to use them.

Certain Tool cards have synergy with current cards. For example, combining the Rocky Helmet with Druddigon’s Rough Skin a
title: How to use Pokémon Tool cards in Pokémon TCG Pocket

description: A Steelbook version of the first season of the acclaimed HBO series, The Last of Us, will be available on Mar. 18 and is currently available to pre-order exclusively from Amazon for $39.42 (was $49.99). This limited edition run of the 4K Blu-ray version of the series contains the same four discs and bonus features as the standard version, but comes packaged in a Steelbook case with
title: Where to pre-order The Last of Us season 1 Steelbook

description: The United States Copyright Office, a federal organization and a taxpayer-funded public good founded in 1897, has issued formal guidance on the issue of AI-generated content. A document posted in January states that works lacking “human authorship” will not be protected by U.S. copyright. However, “the requisite level of creativity” required to fulfill that criteria “is extremely low.” The document was also reported on by
title: US Copyright Office:  generative AI art requires ‘human authorship’ for protection

description:
Hey you! Yeah, you! You look like the kind of person who hasn’t played Alan Wake 2 yet. No, I will not explain what I mean by that.

Anyway, you’re in luck, because if you also have an Xbox Series X/S, you can check out The Game Awards 2023 winner for Best Game Direction, Best Narrative, and Best Art Direction
title: Alan Wake 2 is free to play on Xbox this weekend, no Game Pass required

description: The Expanse is, by far, my favorite sci-fi series of the past decade. But unfortunately, select seasons of the series, which found a home on Prime Video after its cancellation on SyFy, will soon be unavailable to stream. According to their respective pages, the first three seasons of The Expanse will be leaving Prime Video on Feb. 6 at 4 p.m. P
title: Here’s where to buy The Expanse on Blu-ray before it leaves Prime Video

description:
There are a whopping 78 unique suits in Spider-Man 2. That might sound like a lot for one Spider-Man, but when you consider that this game features two — Peter Parker and Miles Morales — it’s a bit more reasonable.

In this Spider-Man 2 guide, we’ve listed out all suits in Spider-Man 2 for Peter Parker and Miles Morales (as well as images, so you can see how cool they look before you earn them). We’ve also detailed h
title: All Spider-Man 2 suits and how to unlock them

description:
The owner of the Super Mario grocery store in San Ramón, Costa Rica claimed victory over Nintendo on Jan. 28, telling his Facebook followers that an attempt by the massive video game developer to block his trademark was denied by the country’s Registro Nacional. The post was first spotted by a user on ResetEra.

In the process of our own reporting, Polygon received several documents from the lawyer representing Super Mario owner Jose Mario Alfaro González confirming his story. Nintendo did not respond to a request for com
title: Super Mario grocery store wins trademark battle with Nintendo

description:
Two hundred and thirty cycles. Enough time to drift and wither away in an asteroid belt. To leave footprints, both big and small, in the places we visit and the people we meet. Amending past mistakes and carving a space for a better future at the cost of our own weariness, all for the sake of making a difference in the lives of the people around us.

Citizen Sleeper 2: Starward Vector sparks constant reflection on the way we interact with others and the philosophies we choose as our driving force. Much like with its predecessor, the team at Jump Over the Age explores themes around prec
title: Friendship is survival in Citizen Sleeper 2

description:
Marvel’s Spider-Man 2 launched on PC on Thursdy, just a day after Sony confirmed its PC specs and dropped the requirement of a PSN account for PC versions of its games. The game is available to buy on Steam and the Epic Games Store.

If it’s a Steam code you’re after, we’ve found a deal that knocks $9 off before tax. Normally, Spider-Man 2 for PC costs $59.99, but you can grab it once you’re logged in at Green Man
title: Spider-Man 2 is out today on PC, and it’s already 15% off

description: Long before Polygon, video game lovers relied on print magazines to pass time at school, on commutes, and during slow days at work when the boss wasn’t looking. In the ‘90s, I checked the mailbox each day for the latest issue from publications like Electronic Gaming Monthly and GamePro, dog-earing pages so I could quickly revisit tiny, fuzzy images of upcoming PlayStation games that looked — to my childhood eyes — like graphical miracles. When I left for college, my parents hurled my dusty boxes full of mags into the dump. I assumed I’d never again see the
title: Read 1,500 classic game magazines online for free — including EGM and GamePro

description: Few experiences are quite as terrifying as waking up with no idea who or where you are. Even more so when it turns out that the answer to the latter is a derelict space station where everyone else has been viciously murdered. Such is the premise of Ash, the upcoming sci-fi horror feature from director Steven Ellison (aka
title: Something has gone terribly wrong in the trailer for Flying Lotus’ Ash

description:
When comedian, writer, and actor Vinny Thomas logged on to our Zoom call, one thing immediately jumped out: his background. Instantly recognizable from some of his videos, it depicts an ornate, palatial estate with a seemingly endless hallway, massive windows, and glass chandeliers. The background, it turns out, is not a digital effect — it’s a real backdrop behind him, and one of multiple he has in rotation.

“I appreciate the old ways,” Thomas explains. “Artisanal Zoom backgrounds are a lost art.”

It’s that attention to detail and affinity for offbe
title: Viral comedian Vinny Thomas broke the one Star Wars improv rule while filming Ahsoka

description:
Most YouTube essays about video games dig into a single popular title. Some bring together a bundle of games to unpack a trend in design or culture. Noah Caldwell-Gervais’s latest critique takes on the entirety of Dragon Age, a long-running, long-winded franchise of fantasy role-playing games. No wonder he needed 6.5 hours.

“[Playing the complete Dragon Age series] is a similar experience to reading a massive fantasy epic with hefty sequel following hefty sequel,” says Caldwell-Gervais as he sets the table for his thoughtful monologue. “The kind of thing that takes up an entire goddamn bookshelf by the time it’s done. Taken as just
title: Watch a new 6.5-hour Dragon Age video essay from one of YouTube’s best game critics

description: John Harper’s Blades in the Dark, one of the more popular non-Dungeons & Dragons tabletop role-playing games to be released in the last decade, is getting a big upgrade. Titled Blades ’68, the new official supplement advances the gritty, industrial world of Doskvol forward an entire century. Designed by Tim Denee, creator of the subversive battle royale-style TTRPG Deathmatch Island, it will be published by Evil Hat Productions. The playtest opens on Jan.
title: Blades ’68 turns Blades in the Dark into a groovy spy thriller

description:
Don’t shoot the messenger, but Valentine’s Day is right around the corner, on Friday, Feb. 14. If you’re looking to share an experience with your valentine this year in addition to whatever else you might have planned, consider one of Lego’s floral bouquets. It has a vast selection, with each one providing simple instructions for building with a partner. Once complete, the stemmed arrangements make for a great display, and can even be “trimmed,” ensuring they’ll fit in any planter or vase you have lying around.

While all of our selections are available from a variety of retailers, it
title: Build yourself a memorable Valentine’s Day with these floral Lego sets

description: Hello Kitty Island Adventure was first released as an Apple Arcade exclusive — arguably one of the only worthwhile exclusives the service has ever offered. The open-world Hello Kitty-themed life sim was well received upon its release in July 2023, but the game’s potential for competing with other great life sims was stunted by the contract. Now, a year and a half later, Hello Kitty Island Adventure finally comes to Nintendo Switch and Windows PC, with more console releases planned for the rest of 2025. And while the game screams Switch
title: Hello Kitty Island Adventure’s quirks are well worth enduring

description:
The Space-Time Smackdown expansion is live in Pokémon TCG Pocket, but no, it doesn’t mean the Genetic Apex expansion is gone. You just need to switch booster packs to see it.

This update brings 140 new cards to the game and introduces trading to the game. It also changes how the application looks on the frontend. Most notably: Y
title: How to switch booster packs in Pokémon TCG Pocket

description: Compared to the original Disney musical Moana, which largely just follows wayfarer Moana (Auli‘i Cravalho) and cocky demigod Maui (Dwayne Johnson) for most of the movie, Moana 2 boasts
title: Disney needs more morally ambiguous characters like Moana 2’s bat goddess

description: When Polygon had a chance to sit down with most of the cast of Star Trek: Section 31 last week, we asked all of them whether their appreciation for Star Trek had changed since they became part of the storied sci-fi franchise — whether they’d been fans for ages or were less familiar with the setting.
title: Star Trek: Section 31’s resident ‘baby Trekkie’ had the cutest first contact with a Trek legend

description:
On Feb. 6 at 4 p.m. PST, The Expanse is reportedly scheduled to leave Prime Video — not all of it, mind you. Just the first three seasons; those are the ones that aired on Syfy, before the show was rescued from cancellation by Prime. So while seasons 4-6 will stay on Prime Video, the beginning of the show will be gone. 

This isn’t a sure thing. And there have be
title: There’s weird streaming rights issues, and then there’s whatever’s happening with The Expanse

description: Nvidia’s GeForce RTX 50-series graphics cards are now available at select brick-and-mortar and online retailers. If you’re lucky enough to snatch one of Nvidia’s powerful, yet surprisingly compact GPUs before other eager PC gamers, you’ll get to try out the new Multi Frame Generation feature in DLSS 4 that’s exclusive to 50-series GPUs. To put it simply, it uses AI to improvise extra frames (three AI-created frames for every one frame rendered), allowing games to run at even faster frame rates and higher resolutions than they’d be capable of thr
title: Where to buy Nvidia’s RTX 5080 and 5090 GPUs
